name: AddText
description: # Add text to the document at current position.

name: InsertText
description: # Insert string at a position.

name: ClearAll
description: # Delete all text in the document.

name: DeleteRange
description: # Delete a range of text in the document.

name: Redo
description: # Redoes the next action on the undo history.

name: SelectAll
description: # Select all the text in the document.

name: GotoLine
description: # Set caret to start of a line and ensure it is visible.

name: GotoPos
description: # Set caret to a position and ensure it is visible.

name: SetCurrentPos
description: # Sets the position of the caret.

name: SetSelectionStart
description: # Sets the position that starts the selection - this becomes the anchor.

name: SetSelectionEnd
description: # Sets the position that ends the selection - this becomes the caret.

name: ReplaceSel
description: # Replace the selected text with the argument text.

name: Undo
description: # Undo one action in the undo history.

name: Cut
description: # Cut the selection to the clipboard.

name: Copy
description: # Copy the selection to the clipboard.

name: Paste
description: # Paste the contents of the clipboard into the document replacing the selection.

name: Clear
description: # Clear the selection.

name: SetText
description: # Replace the contents of the document with the argument text.

name: AppendText
description: # Append a string to the end of the document without changing the selection.

name: LinesJoin
description: # Join the lines in the target.

name: LinesSplit
description: # where possible.

name: LineDown
description: # Move caret down one line.

name: LineDownExtend
description: # Move caret down one line extending selection to new caret position.

name: LineUp
description: # Move caret up one line.

name: LineUpExtend
description: # Move caret up one line extending selection to new caret position.

name: CharLeft
description: # Move caret left one character.

name: CharLeftExtend
description: # Move caret left one character extending selection to new caret position.

name: CharRight
description: # Move caret right one character.

name: CharRightExtend
description: # Move caret right one character extending selection to new caret position.

name: WordLeft
description: # Move caret left one word.

name: WordLeftExtend
description: # Move caret left one word extending selection to new caret position.

name: WordRight
description: # Move caret right one word.

name: WordRightExtend
description: # Move caret right one word extending selection to new caret position.

name: Home
description: # Move caret to first position on line.

name: HomeExtend
description: # Move caret to first position on line extending selection to new caret position.

name: LineEnd
description: # Move caret to last position on line.

name: LineEndExtend
description: # Move caret to last position on line extending selection to new caret position.

name: DocumentStart
description: # Move caret to first position in document.

name: DocumentStartExtend
description: # Move caret to first position in document extending selection to new caret position.

name: DocumentEnd
description: # Move caret to last position in document.

name: DocumentEndExtend
description: # Move caret to last position in document extending selection to new caret position.

name: PageUp
description: # Move caret one page up.

name: PageUpExtend
description: # Move caret one page up extending selection to new caret position.

name: PageDown
description: # Move caret one page down.

name: PageDownExtend
description: # Move caret one page down extending selection to new caret position.

name: EditToggleOvertype
description: # Switch from insert to overtype mode or the reverse.

name: Cancel
description: # Cancel any modes such as call tip or auto-completion list display.

name: DeleteBack
description: # Delete the selection or if no selection, the character before the caret.

name: Tab
description: # If more than one line selected, indent the lines.

name: BackTab
description: # Dedent the selected lines.

name: NewLine
description: # Insert a new line, may use a CRLF, CR or LF depending on EOL mode.

name: DelWordLeft
description: # Delete the word to the left of the caret.

name: DelWordRight
description: # Delete the word to the right of the caret.

name: DelWordRightEnd
description: # Delete the word to the right of the caret, but not the trailing non-word characters.

name: LineCut
description: # Cut the line containing the caret.

name: LineDelete
description: # Delete the line containing the caret.

name: LineTranspose
description: # Switch the current line with the previous.

name: LineReverse
description: # Reverse order of selected lines.

name: LineDuplicate
description: # Duplicate the current line.

name: LowerCase
description: # Transform the selection to lower case.

name: UpperCase
description: # Transform the selection to upper case.

name: HomeDisplay
description: # Move caret to first position on display line.

name: HomeDisplayExtend
description: # new caret position.

name: LineEndDisplay
description: # Move caret to last position on display line.

name: LineEndDisplayExtend
description: # caret position.

name: HomeWrap
description: # HomeDisplay, then to start of document line Home.

name: HomeWrapExtend
description: # HomeDisplayExtend, then to start of document line HomeExtend.

name: LineEndWrap
description: # LineEndDisplay, then to start of document line LineEnd.

name: LineEndWrapExtend
description: # LineEndDisplayExtend, then to start of document line LineEndExtend.

name: LineCopy
description: # Copy the line containing the caret.

name: WordPartLeft
description: # Move to the previous change in capitalisation.

name: WordPartLeftExtend
description: # to new caret position.

name: WordPartRight
description: # Move to the change next in capitalisation.

name: WordPartRightExtend
description: # to new caret position.

name: DelLineLeft
description: # Delete back from the current position to the start of the line.

name: DelLineRight
description: # Delete forwards from the current position to the end of the line.

name: ParaDown
description: # Move caret down one paragraph

name: ParaDownExtend
description: # Extend selection down one paragraph

name: ParaUp
description: # Move caret up one paragraph

name: ParaUpExtend
description: # Extend selection up one paragraph

name: CopyRange
description: # Copy a range of text to the clipboard. Positions are clipped into the document.

name: CopyText
description: # Copy argument text to the clipboard.

name: LineDownRectExtend
description: # Move caret down one line, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.

name: LineUpRectExtend
description: # Move caret up one line, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.

name: CharLeftRectExtend
description: # Move caret left one character, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.

name: CharRightRectExtend
description: # Move caret right one character, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.

name: HomeRectExtend
description: # Move caret to first position on line, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.

name: LineEndRectExtend
description: # Move caret to last position on line, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.

name: PageUpRectExtend
description: # Move caret one page up, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.

name: PageDownRectExtend
description: # Move caret one page down, extending rectangular selection to new caret position.

name: StutteredPageUp
description: # Move caret to top of page, or one page up if already at top of page.

name: StutteredPageUpExtend
description: # Move caret to top of page, or one page up if already at top of page, extending selection to new caret position.

name: StutteredPageDown
description: # Move caret to bottom of page, or one page down if already at bottom of page.

name: StutteredPageDownExtend
description: # Move caret to bottom of page, or one page down if already at bottom of page, extending selection to new caret position.

name: WordLeftEnd
description: # Move caret left one word, position cursor at end of word.

name: WordLeftEndExtend
description: # Move caret left one word, position cursor at end of word, extending selection to new caret position.

name: WordRightEnd
description: # Move caret right one word, position cursor at end of word.

name: WordRightEndExtend
description: # Move caret right one word, position cursor at end of word, extending selection to new caret position.

name: CopyAllowLine
description: # Copy the selection, if selection empty copy the line with the caret

name: RotateSelection
description: # Set the main selection to the next selection.

name: SwapMainAnchorCaret
description: # Swap that caret and anchor of the main selection.

name: MultipleSelectAddNext
description: # If the current selection is empty then select word around caret.

name: MultipleSelectAddEach
description: # If the current selection is empty then select word around caret.

name: VerticalCentreCaret
description: # Centre current line in window.

name: MoveSelectedLinesUp
description: # Move the selected lines up one line, shifting the line above after the selection

name: MoveSelectedLinesDown
description: # Move the selected lines down one line, shifting the line below before the selection

name: ScrollToStart
description: # Scroll to start of document.

name: ScrollToEnd
description: # Scroll to end of document.
